snippet.title: System Purge: Hollow Point - Official Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Faced with a horrifying tragedy, you must delve into a flowering realm of memories and nightmares to save your dead lover. Watch the System Purge: Hollow Point trailer to see gameplay and atmospheric world of this 2D platformer sequel. System Purge: Hollow Point will be available on PC.
